header.title:
Hello I’m {name},
Interactive Media Designer & Music Producer
header.subtitle: I’m an Interactive Media Designer and Musician, focused on creating immersive user experiences that merge art, technology, and sound. I combine UX/UI design, creative coding, and music production to develop innovative projects that inspire and generate real impact.

uxui.title: UX / UI Design
uxui.description: Design of user-centered interfaces and flows: wireframes, clickable prototypes, and usability testing for digital products that maximize experience and conversion.

interactive.title: Interactive Experiences & Prototyping
interactive.description: Creation of installations and interactive prototypes (web, sensors, mapping) that combine sound, visuals, and hardware for events, museums, and experiential spaces.

music.title: Music Production & Sound Design
music.description: Composition, sound textures design, mixing, and sonic branding for multimedia projects, installations, and audiovisual content. Delivery of stems and usage guidelines.
